item.title: Index
item.description: hugorha Hugo theme for lorhammer Hugo project https://gohugo.io/ Use hugorha cd themes git clone https://github.com/itkSource/hugorha.git Add hugorha has theme in your config.toml. All your page of first level menu must have menu: "main" in there meta. In your config you must have : [params] # The title of your homepage (to be rendered in /) homePageTitle = "Hugorha" # The logo path (placed in /static) and name with the extention logoFileName = "images/headerLogo.

item.title: Styles
item.description: Styles Link [hugorha](https://github.com/itkSource/hugorha) hugorha Image ![logo](http://localhost:1313/images/headerLogo.svg?height=80px) Be careful the image is sized at runtime (by js), all style are available but think it’s set by js (border-radius become borderRadius…) ![logo](http://localhost:1313/images/headerLogo.svg?width=120px&borderRadius=50%) Alert > This is an important message. This is an important message. FontAwesome <i class="fa fa-heartbeat" aria-hidden="true"></i> <i class="fa fa-info-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> <i class="fa fa-tags" aria-hidden="true"></i> List * 1 list * 1.
